messages.subject: More ..................
messages.msgSnippet: Just one more thing.  Some of you who seem to jump quickly to Sandra s defense are forgetting that Sandra is the one usually screaming that she s been insulted
messages.messageBody:
Just one more thing. Some of you who seem to jump quickly to Sandra's defense are forgetting that Sandra is the one usually screaming that she's been insulted when someone's posts are as blunt as her own usually are. Twice maybe three times (can't remember exactly) this past week she accused others on the list of being insulting. To me their posts were not near as offensive as hers.
OK! that's my one thing, said only for my own satisfaction. Because I am now unsubscribe from the list and intend use my time more wisely. There is a LOT of our time wasted here in front of this comuter discussing Sandra. She must be flattered!
Thanks to those of you who were a great help to me with advice and comments.

Betty


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
